Html:
Perhaps I'm missing something simple, but the Silverlight 2 Stock Trader example doesn't load as the WPF Desktop example does. Is the Silverlight 2 example fully baked? I read the readme and the documentation and didnt see anything extra I needed. When the silverlight test page loaded it only showed the stock list and that was it.

I've already seen other examples/source on the blogosphere but I'd like to get this one working to verify some assumptions that I have about the product.

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks guys.

You're not missing anything.Â  The Silverlight version of the RI does not have all the features, yet, that the desktop version does.

As we're completing the Silverlight features of the Composite Application Library that the RI depends on, such as EventAggregator and Commanding, we'll be expanding the features in the Silvelright version of the RI.

Hope this helps,

-b
